comment: This guy SUCKS and that is putting it nice! He doesn't know what is going on. He changes assignment dates! He is a procrastinator!!!!! If you go to his office to asking him what is going on make sure you take some breath mints for him!!!! This is Cameron University CJ department WORSE instructor!!!!!!!!!!

Mr Hong was a terrible teacher. He was not familiar with the subject matter he was trying to teach, victimology. He couldn't answer questions on why his slides contained information that was contradictory to the book. He did not even know what the Bill of Rights were! That is ridiculous since he was teaching a Criminal Justice class. Glad he's gone

Instructor resigned/was removed from his position by the department. Useless as an instructor and not dedicated in any way to helping students succeed in course. He cancelled at least 8 classes and now we are trying to move on with Dr. Petersen as a fill-in for the remainder of the semester.
